title: What are some of the major tenets of modernism? - Quora

response.answer_text: Unfortunately, it seems that anything that came from your parents era is verboten. It is such foolishness that stops great progress. God is dumped in favour of “lets accept anyone's personal truth” over real God truth. Is it any wonder there is a multiplicity of new phycological problems, most far from a cure. The creator God made us, knows how we should function, has a great plan for each of us, but the vast majority, even if they accept that there is a God, do not surrender their lives to Him, so miss out entirely on the best life possible.
